name: @tsdiapi/inforu
description: A TSDIAPI plugin for integrating Inforu SMS service, enabling message sending via Inforu API.

variables.name: INFORU_USERNAME
variables.description: The username for Inforu API authentication.

variables.name: INFORU_PASSWORD
variables.description: The password for Inforu API authentication.

variables.name: INFORU_SENDER_NAME
variables.description: The sender name to be used for Inforu SMS messages.
